title: Helicone's 6-Month Recap: Innovations and Future Vision

description: Explore Helicone's journey over the past 6 months, highlighting our key achievements, new features, and the roadmap for our AI observability platform. Learn about our latest innovations and get a glimpse into the future of Helicone.
